g.text: ANSWERS TO DIAGNOSTIC TEST B: ANALYTIC GEOMETRY

(f) Find an equation of the circle for which
-plane de±ned by the equation or inequalities.
If you had dif±culty with these problems, you may wish to consult
the review of analytic geometry in Appendixes B and C.
